Description: Includes raw material extraction and transport to manufacturing.
Covers transport of raw materials to manufacturing plant.
Covers product transport from factory to construction site.
Covers all construction and installation activities on site.
Includes emissions/releases during the use phase of the building.
Covers regular activities to maintain building performance.
Covers activities to restore damaged or worn components.
Includes replacement of components due to damage or end-of-life.
Covers major renovations or alterations to the building.
Covers transport of waste materials from site to processing facilities.
Covers sorting and preparation of waste for reuse recycling or energy recovery.
Covers final disposal (e.g. landfill or energy recovery.
Covers all energy consumed during building operation.
Covers all water consumption during building operation.
Covers potential benefits from reuse  recycling or energy recovery.
